title: Tahm Kench can't get the reward from relic(support item)
body: So I started to play tahm kench{{champion:223}}  as a support recently, but I found out that he can't get the reward by finishing the mission that is given by the Relic Shield{{item:3302}}  , which is earning 650 golds with this item. I'm not sure if it is a bug or there is something that I need to know.

replies.body: ohhh i figured it out. you gotta upgraded it to {{item:3097}}

Hmmmm that is a little. I've heard a few different players didn't get the bonus item from finishing those support item quests, but each time it turned out that the player already had 6 items. Since they already had a full inventory, the item from the quest couldn't be added. 

Let me know if you already had 6 items when the quest was completed. If you did have an item slot open, shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with a screenshot or video if you can make it happen again and we can start looking into it!
That's interesting. I'm not sure. I don't usually play {{champion:223}} so I wouldn't know.
